name: BinauralBeats
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: binaural beats
des:
The Binaural Beats sleep aid is brought to you by one of the world’s top sleep and relaxation artists. This ultra premium sound is taken directly from the album “Binaural Beats” which is used by thousands to aid in sleep and relaxation each night. Now, for the first time, the relaxation power of Binaural Beats is available on your Alexa device. Binaural Beats is specifically engineered to help you get to and stay asleep by using a custom equalized recording of real Binaural Beats. 

HOW TO USE: To use Binaural Beats: Say “Alexa, Play Binaural Beats” Once running, Binaural Beats will automatically loop all night, or until you say 'Alexa, stop'. 

UNINTERUPTED PLAY: Binaural Beats premium service includes all night play (2hr instead of 10min loops) and high quality sound.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
